data.name: Forbidden myths
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the mysterious and dangerous world of Slavic mythology.
Meet characters from Slavic folklore, such as Baba Yaga or the Cat Bayun.
Fight against complex and unusual monsters, the main one of which will be Koschei the immortal.
And go all the way from a simple ordinary fighter to one of the most famous people in the principality.
Forbidden myths are waiting for you

The game is a Souls-like third-person shooter with RPG elements. A flexible character leveling system will be available to you.
A feature of the game is the absence of ordinary monsters - all opponents will be full-fledged bosses. And in between battles, you will enjoy the plot.
